entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023
